description: Savor tropical sweetness and zesty hibiscus notes, wrapped in a crispy potato shell. Celebrating National Day with flavors of Saint Lucia's culinary heritage.
Today, savor the luxurious blend of buttery Chardonnay and earthy white truffles in each crispy bite. A toast to flavor, celebrating today's culinary delights.

chip_name: Moringa Leaf Fritter, Sea Salt & Curry Crumble
description: Did you know Moringa leaves are rich in nutrients and traditionally used in African cuisine? Today's Kettle Chip features these leaves, offering an exotic crunch with sea salt and curry crumble.

chip_name: Molua Seafood Medley, Oceanic Truffle Crisp
description: Did you know Molua is the Hawaiian word for mackerel? Today's Oceanic Truffle Crisp combines zesty seafood medley with earthy truffles, blending flavors from the sea and land.

chip_name: Italian Truffle Twist, Basilica Parmesan Crunch
description: Did you know potatoes were first cultivated by the Incas in Peru over 7000 years ago? Our today's Chip of the Day, Italian Truffle Twist, Basilica Parmesan Crunch, celebrates this ancient root with a ...
event_name: Dedication of the Basilica of St Mary Major (Catholic Church)
